Dialogue.1: Walking through the market with Rein for a bit before you get to Violet's stand
Dialogue.2: "oh, I've been wanting to do a still life study??? do you think she'd let me, you know, borrow a fish to paint?"
Dialogue.4: Violet greets you and market pops up
Dialogue.5: Rein asks for a fish and Violet laughs and goes to work, giving an overview of the different types
Dialogue.6: Rein is initially embarrassed but gets progressively more engaged as she talks, asking questions about the different kinds.
Dialogue.7: "And what's that soft pink one named? It's so beautiful with the way those fins arc out behind it, like you can still see it gliding through the air???"
Dialogue.8: Violet pulls one out and chops it up in front of Rein, partly b/c it's just business to her, but partially to get a reaction.
Dialogue.9: "Delicacy ???round these parts. Pearl-catcher fin. Pearl-catcher tail. Even the eyeball goes for good silver. You want one to look at?"
Dialogue.11: "Better move quick then. Gotta get these finished up this {time}. Need to be out to market while they're fresh."
